Title: Personal Finance App
Description:
You can try it here by logging in as a Guest.


Backend:

  • Built with a .NET Web API connected to a SQLite database.

  • Supports user registration and management of transactions (add, modify, search, filter, delete).

  • Retrieves specific information like totals by categories, locations, payment methods, and transaction types.

Frontend:

  • Built with Blazor WebAssembly for a responsive, dynamic user experience.

  • Dashboard displays total expenses, income, and balance over a selected time range.

  • Interactive pie chart summarizes transaction totals, with breakdowns by categories, locations, or payment methods.

  • Transaction management page shows a paginated grid with filter, create, modify, and delete options.

  • Allows splitting transactions into subtransactions with automatic total calculation.

Deployment:

  • Web API and database hosted on Azure App Service.

  • Blazor WebAssembly frontend deployed to Azure Static Web Apps using CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions.

You can find the code here.

Title: Collaborative Surgery Simulator
Description:
It is a prototype designed to create a multi-user environment for simulating lipoma extraction surgery. This simulator allows multiple users to engage in a realistic surgical experience, each assuming specific roles such as surgeon, assistant, or resident, and communicating through an integrated voice chat feature. This simulator has garnered academic recognition, including a publication in an IEEE article.

  • Online Multiplayer System: Users can select and perform different roles within the surgical team, enhancing collaborative learning and practice with real-time voice communication.

  • Real-Time 3D Mesh Modification: Simulates the surgical cutting process in real time, allowing users to make precise cuts on the 3D model of the skin covering the lipoma, closely mimicking the actual surgical procedure.

  • Avatar Animations with hand controls: Includes a procedural rig that enables full hand movement and interaction with objects, providing a realistic and interactive experience.

  • Object Transfer Between Users: Facilitates seamless transfer of instruments and objects between users, mirroring the teamwork required in an actual operating room.

Title: UNO 3D
Description:
It is a sophisticated adaptation of the classic card game UNO, presented in an immersive three-dimensional environment. This version retains the beloved gameplay while introducing a minimalist design for the cards, creating an elegant and engaging visual experience.

  • Multiplayer System: Accommodates up to six players, making it ideal for both casual and competitive play.

  • 3D Animations: Features dynamic 3D animations for special cards, enhancing the interactive experience.

  • Complete Game Logic: Fully implements the traditional rules and mechanics of UNO, ensuring a seamless and authentic gameplay experience.

Title: Breakout
Description:
My version of the classic "Breakout" game features an attractive sci-fi style and fun, challenging levels.

  • Power-Ups: Elevate your gaming experience with power-ups that augment your paddle's size and equip you with lasers, allowing for strategic block destruction.

  • Immerse yourself in the sci-fi atmosphere with captivating music and sound effects.

You can find the code here.

Title: Pong
Description:
My version of the classic "Pong" game features an engaging sci-fi aesthetic and customizable gameplay, enhancing replayability and providing fresh challenges with each playthrough.

  • Local Multiplayer: Supports up to 4 players, with 2 players using the keyboard and 2 using gamepads.

  • Flexible Player Options: Players can choose between competing against human opponents or AI, allowing for a versatile gaming experience.

  • Customizable Gameplay: Players can enable or disable obstacles and power-ups to add complexity. Power-ups can freeze opponents or increase their speed, enhancing the challenge and strategic depth of the game.

You can find the code here.

Title: Tira Island
Description:
This project is a 2D action/adventure platformer demo developed collaboratively with two colleagues. I was responsible for all programming aspects related to gameplay, enemies, and player controls.

  • Modular Weapon System: Implemented a modular weapon system utilizing object pooling to optimize performance and adhere to good coding practices.

  • Development Tools: Created various tools to simplify the addition of new enemy types and features, enhancing the overall gameplay experience.

Title: Jump Command
Description:
Inspired by Google's Dinosaur Game, this game challenges players to dodge obstacles and survive for as long as possible. The game offers a unique twist with the option to control the character using voice commands or the traditional keyboard, making it accessible and engaging for a wide range of players.

  • Voice Command Controls: Play using voice commands in either English or Spanish, or opt for classic keyboard controls for a versatile gaming experience.

  • Increasing Difficulty: The game becomes progressively more challenging over time, ensuring that players remain engaged and tested.

  • Multiplatform Compatibility: Enjoy the game on both desktop and web browsers, providing flexibility and convenience for players.

Title: Cookie Mania
Description:
Single-player game designed to test your speed and precision. The goal is simple: collect as many cookies as you can within a limited time while navigating a dynamically changing terrain.

  • Procedural Map Generation: Every playthrough offers a unique challenge with maps generated on the fly, ensuring endless replayability and a fresh experience each time you play.

  • Stream Writing for Score Storage: Your high scores are efficiently saved using advanced stream writing techniques, allowing you to track and compare your progress seamlessly.

Title: Cryptography Game
Description:
• Interactive 3D puzzle game that teaches basic cryptography concepts

  • Includes three levels with increasing difficulty:

    • Level 1 – Caesar Cipher: Use a clock to decode messages from a to-do list

    • Level 2 – Grid Code: Place missing characters, unlock a keyword, and find a four-digit code

    • Level 3 – Morse Code: Tune into radio channels and decode song titles using a Morse Code sheet

  • Players fix broken attractions by solving puzzles in each level

  • Each completed level rewards a badge and visual feedback (e.g., animations)

  • Designed to be educational and engaging, combining fun gameplay with problem-solving skills

Title: Car Web Game
Description:
• 3D racing game built with Babylon.js featuring realistic car physics, sound effects, and camera controls.

  • AI-powered chat assistant using Google Gemini API provides tips and hints based on player progress.

  • Microservices architecture using Node.js, Apollo GraphQL, and MongoDB.

  • Frontend built with React using a microfrontends setup.

  • JWT authentication for secure login and user sessions.

  • Player progress, experience points, and achievements are tracked and saved across sessions.

  • Modular codebase with separate services for authentication, progress tracking, and AI assistant.

You can find the code here.

Title: The Guardian
Description:
A short, atmospheric action-RPG.

You are the last Guardian, sworn to protect the boundary between the living and the dead. Now, that boundary is breaking.

Restless souls have begun slipping through dimensional rifts, possessing inanimate objects—mannequins, lanterns, and more. Destroying them only delays the inevitable, as spirits jump from one object to the next.

Your mission is clear: find the gates through which they enter and seal them—before the dead overrun the world of the living. Explore haunted landscapes, uncover lost relics, and battle relentless spirits in this eerie, fast-paced RPG.

The dead are rising. Only you can stop them.

Title: Sub-In-Titan
Description:
A short, story-driven underwater adventure.

Descend into the crushing depths of the Mariana Trench in a desperate search for your lost brother: a reckless explorer who vanished chasing a sunken legend. Armed only with your wits and a weaponized submersible, you navigate a hostile abyss where the light dies and monsters stir.

As you follow the fading trail he left behind, myth blurs with reality. Ancient, monstrous creatures lurk in the dark, guarding secrets that were never meant to be found. You’ll need to fight, explore, and survive the deep in order to uncover the truth (and maybe bring him home).

Something waits at the bottom.
And it's not just treasure.

Title: Rat-Escape
Description:
A small puzzle-platformer.

You are a lab rat (but not an ordinary one). Inside a high-tech testing facility, your intelligence is being pushed to the limit. Navigate each level by stepping on every tile exactly once to progress to the next test chamber.

But you're not alone.

Other rogue rats roam the grid, threatening to ruin your path by stepping where they shouldn’t. You'll need sharp thinking (and a laser turret) to stop them before they sabotage your progress.

Precision. Timing. Survival.
